title: Stargazing with You - Novel Updates
genre: Romance   School Life   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Childhood Friends   College/University   First Love   Hackers
author: Dr. Solo
description:
Also known as Samoyed and Husky, the story primarily revolves around a pair of childhood friends from their birth up until their university life. It also touches on aspects of cybersecurity and white hat hackers. Bai Ying x Jiang He

Part of the Solo Universe.>
